author: Salvatore Calabrese
method: Place the gin, Cointreau, lemon juice and marmalade into a cocktail shaker with some ice and shake well to combine. To serve, strain into a Martini glass and garnish with a spiral of orange peel.
ingredients: 50ml/2fl oz gin,  1 tbsp Cointreau, or similar orange liqueur,  1 tbsp lemon juice,  1Â½ tsp orange marmalade,  orange peel spiral, to garnish
